content:
In my OperationDefinition we have one parameter with type of resource (see agent in the link below)

https://simplifier.net/ukdigitalmedicine/operationdefinition-task-release-message-duplicate-2

I've tried to use targetProfile to specify the resource but that's just for Reference or Canonical types.

Is there a way of doing this?
The only way to do it right now is with inputProfile on the overall set of inputs
